user.title: Add a time-based cover
user.description: Set up a cover that tracks position based on movement time.

data_description.device_type: Control via switch entities, or wrap an existing cover entity with time-based positioning.
data_description.input_mode: Switch: latching relays stay on/off. Pulse: momentary press with separate stop. Toggle: same button starts and stops.

details.title: Configure cover
details.description: Choose how this cover is controlled.

data_description.travelling_time_down: Time in seconds for the cover to fully close.
data_description.travelling_time_up: Time in seconds for the cover to fully open.

data.travel_moves_with_tilt: Tilt movements also affect travel position

data_description.tilting_time_down: Time in seconds for tilt to go from fully open to fully closed.
data_description.tilting_time_up: Time in seconds for tilt to go from fully closed to fully open.
data_description.travel_moves_with_tilt: When enabled, tilt movements also change the travel position proportionally.

data_description.pulse_time: How long to press the button in pulse or toggle mode.
data_description.travel_startup_delay: Time the motor takes to start moving. Position tracking starts after this delay.
data_description.tilt_startup_delay: Time the motor takes to start tilting. Position tracking starts after this delay.
data_description.min_movement_time: Movements shorter than this are ignored.
data_description.travel_delay_at_end: Extra time to keep the relay on when reaching fully open or fully closed.

error.tilt_time_pair_required: Both tilt close and tilt open times must be set together.

deprecated_yaml.title: YAML configuration is deprecated
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Cover Time Based using YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

Please remove the YAML configuration and recreate your covers using the UI: **Settings > Devices & Services > Helpers > Create Helper > Cover Time Based**.
